医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
弥撒一般杨百翰研究发现16个新颖的阿尔茨海默氏症风险基因大规模杨百翰群众的研究人员对阿尔茨海默氏病进行了多种术，整个基因组测序协会研究，发现了16个新的易感基因的证据，扩大了代表性不足的人群的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/mass-general-brigham-study-uncovers-16-novel-alzheimers-fink-genes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/mass-general-brigham-study-uncovers-16-novel-alzheimers-------------- #comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=196E72C4-D35B-492F-95C9-A7C0FF279497 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 11:08:07 -0500 Mass General Brigham study uncovers 16 novel Alzheimer's risk genes
早期妊娠营养影响5-6岁的儿童运动发育怀孕早期健康饮食支持儿童在5-6岁时的运动发育。另一方面，较高的母体体内脂肪质量会对孩子的运动发育产生不利影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/early-pregnancy-nutrition-inpacts-childs-childs-childs-motor-development-age-age-5-6.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/early-pregnancy-nutrition-impacts-childs-childs-motor-development-age-age-5-6.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=D38D5925-6385-4F56-BD8D-8D5189F29360 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 09:56:05 -0500 Early pregnancy nutrition impacts child's motor development at age 5-6
研究人员使用杀伤开关创建分枝杆菌，以提高结核病疫苗安全Weill Cornell Medicine的研究人员致力于更有效的结核病（TB）疫苗，已经开发了两种带有“杀死开关”的分枝杆菌菌株，可以在激活免疫反应后触发以阻止细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/researchers-create-mycobacteria-with-kill-kill-switches-to-improve-tb-vaccine-safety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/researchers-create-mycobacteria-with-kill-kill-switches-to-improve-tb-vaccine-safety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92f3d272-9103-4EEB-9154-591F959A62AC Tue, 25 Feb 2025 09:48:23 -0500 Researchers create mycobacteria with kill switches to improve TB vaccine safety
研究解释了为什么大脑中错位的神经元变得过度活跃研究揭示了为什么大脑中错位的神经元过度活跃并导致发育障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/study-explains-why-misplaced-neurons-neurons-in-the-brain-brain-become-overactive.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/study-explains-why-misplaced-neurons-neurons-in-the-brain-brain-become-overactive.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05c43b0f-83eb-4592-9ab7-25ac1dbee56d Tue, 25 Feb 2025 09:09:00 -0500 Study explains why misplaced neurons in the brain become overactive
ctDNA甲基化生物标志物改善了早期肺癌诊断肺癌的早期诊断是临床实践中的关键重点。它可能有助于降低与肺癌相关的死亡率的率，扩大无病生存率，并允许患者不进行医疗干预和并发症而生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/early-lung-cancer-diarosis--proved-with-ctdna-methylation-biomarkers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/early-lung-cancer-diarosis--proved-with-ctdna-methylation-biomarkers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b3c7819-08888888888-45d4-a35d-a35d-a63f667674c1 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 09:01:58 -0500 Early lung cancer diagnosis improved with ctDNA methylation biomarkers
评论重点瞄准针对PIK3CA突变的下一代癌症疗法新发表的基因与疾病的评论探讨了PIK3CA在癌症中的致癌激活，并突出了新兴的靶向疗法，旨在提高治疗效果，同时降低副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/review-highlights-next-generation-generation-cancer-therapies-therapies-targeting-pargeting-pik3ca-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/review-highlights-next-generation-cancer-therapies-therapies-targeting-pargeting-pik3ca-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c06b7438-5b09-409-40ab-aaa5d-20672f8150de Tue, 25 Feb 2025 08:48:19 -0500 Review highlights next-generation cancer therapies targeting PIK3CA mutations
对MTOR途径的新见解为糖尿病性肾病治疗提供了希望一项新发表的基因与疾病研究强调了雷帕霉素（MTOR）途径在糖尿病性肾病（DN）进展中的哺乳动物靶标的至关重要的作用，并探讨了其作为治疗靶标的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/new-insights-into-mtor-pathway offer-ffer-fer-for-for-diabety-diabety-nephropathy-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/new-insights-into-mtor-pathway offer-hope-fer--for-d----------------------------------------------- and-neplecty-nephropathy-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A18470C7-862E-443B-BD6F-9B2-9B2E0B3790EE Tue, 25 Feb 2025 08:20:00 -0500 New insights into mTOR pathway offer hope for diabetic nephropathy treatment
研究发现，加拿大南亚移民的甲状腺功能减退症的几率更高本周发表的一项新的研究针对老年病和老年医学档案，发现加拿大45岁及45岁以上的南亚移民中有10％患有甲状腺功能减退症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/study-finds-higher-odds-higher-odds-of-hypothyridism--hypothyridism--------------------south-south-masian-immermermants-in-canada.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/study-finds-higher-odds-higher-odds-of-hypothyridism--hypothyridism--------------------south-south-masian-impermant-in-canada.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc873b61-7da7-44f0-bbb1-825509d850eee Tue, 25 Feb 2025 08:07:44 -0500 Study finds higher odds of hypothyroidism among South Asian immigrants in Canada
常规心理筛查可以改善母体心血管健康根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》上的《 Go Red for of to Red for American Heart Association》中的新科学陈述，整合常规心理健康筛查和怀孕期间和后期的治疗可能会降低不良怀孕结局的风险并改善孕产妇的心血管健康。公开访问，同行评审的美国心脏协会杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/Routine-psychological-screening-screening-can-imbrove-matrove-maternal-cardiascular-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/routine-psychological-screengencen-screening-can-improve-mertalnal-cardiascular-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfcecc37-F7A9-4649-4649-9A98-B933C5EEAF61 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 07:53:38 -0500 Routine psychological screening can improve maternal cardiovascular health
研究表明，童年创伤从身体上改变了黑人妇女的心埃默里大学（Emory University）的新研究表明，童年创伤在身体上改变了黑人妇女的心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/childhood-trauma-physlate-phys-altersy-alters-the-herts-the-herts-black-women---women-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/Childhood-trauma-physlate-phystaly-alters-the-herts-the-herts-black-women-women-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76ABF32D-C36E-427D-AB07-8E0A727D34ED Tue, 25 Feb 2025 07:35:52 -0500 Childhood trauma physically alters the hearts of Black women, study shows
